Hellpeon chuckles somewhat as he walks amongst the newly revealed 
rolls and after a short while he walks on back with a plasma cannon 
and a grenade launcher strapped across his back, also a plasma cannon 
was strapped over his right shoulder, and an Ionic blaster strapped 
to his other shoulder. A plasma shotgun was also strapped to one of 
his wings as in his hands an old sawed-off shotgun rested in his 
hands, which could have easily crushed it if he wanted to. Across his 
chest wasa bunch of ammo strips full of shells for the gun. He looked 
to the shop keeper and smirked as he cocked the shotgun before 
reaching behind his back and producing two more cred cards with a lot 
of cred on them.

Hellpeon: "Will those six cards cover this all?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> The shopkeeper nods and takes the cards eagerly, reaching down 
under the 
> table he was at, pressing a few buttons, the doors shutting and 
locking, 
> windows being blocked by sliding steel panels, a "Closed" sign 
reading on the 
> front of the "Cookie Store".  The walls swivelled and revealed new 
walls 
> lined with just about every weapon ever.
> 
> "Pick your choice."
> 
> (Remember you can't have more than seven weapons)
